item.title: 美国称将调查中国车辆的国家安全数据风险
item.description: The White House said on Thursday the United States is opening an investigation into whether Chinese vehicle imports pose national security risks and could impose restrictions due to concerns about "connected" car technology.翻译:白宫周四表示，美国正在对中国汽车进口是否构成国家安全风险展开调查，并可能因对“联网”汽车技术的担忧而实施限制。
item.author: David Shepardson

item.title: 芬兰商人齐利亚库斯退出国际米兰竞赛
item.description: Finnish businessman Thomas Zilliacus said on Thursday he had dropped out of the running to buy Inter Milan to focus on clearing his name after police in Singapore issued a warrant for his arrest last week.翻译:芬兰商人托马斯·齐利亚库斯(Thomas Zilliacus)周四表示，在新加坡警方上周对他发出逮捕令后，他已退出收购国际米兰的竞选，以集中精力洗清自己的罪名。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 日本投资者对海外股票的配置多于对本国股票的配置
item.description: Japanese investors are hesitant to own their home stock markets despite the Nikkei's recent surge above bubble-era peaks because of uncertainty about sustained corporate returns and lingering memories of the 1990s market crash.翻译:尽管日经指数最近飙升至泡沫时代的峰值之上，但由于企业持续回报的不确定性以及对 90 年代市场崩盘的挥之不去的记忆，日本投资者对持有本国股票市场仍犹豫不决。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 中国谴责外国对香港即将实施的《国家安全法》第23条的批评
item.description: China on Thursday criticised British Foreign Secretary David Cameron and other foreign politicians for "smearing" an upcoming Hong Kong security law, as local authorities said feedback on the law had been largely positive.翻译:中国周四批评英国外交大臣戴维·卡梅伦和其他外国政客“抹黑”即将出台的香港安全法，因为地方当局表示对该法的反馈基本上是积极的。
item.author: Jessie Pang, James Pomfret

item.title: 中国企业加大招聘力度，但在薪酬方面却收紧
item.description: Chinese university graduate Zhang Baichuan travels hundreds of kilometres from one job fair to another in a final push to find a better offer than the unappealing one he received after more than 1,000 applications.翻译:中国大学毕业生张百川长途跋涉数百公里，从一个招聘会到另一个招聘会，最后努力寻找比他在 1000 多份申请后收到的毫无吸引力的工作机会更好的工作机会。
item.author: Ellen Zhang, Xiaoyu Yin, Marius Zaharia

item.title: 舒适达制造商 Haleon 因股票回购和债务下降而跃升
item.description: Haleon plans to buy back 500 million pounds ($633 million) of its shares this year amid firm demand for its products and progress in reducing debt, sending the British consumer healthcare giant's shares up over 8% on Thursday.翻译:由于对其产品的强劲需求以及在减少债务方面取得的进展，Haleon 计划今年回购 5 亿英镑（6.33 亿美元）的股票，这使得这家英国消费者医疗保健巨头的股价周四上涨超过 8%。
item.author: Eva Mathews

item.title: 独家：SpaceX 与越南就星链计划的谈判暂停
item.description: SpaceX's plans to provide communications services to Vietnam with its Starlink satellites have been put on hold, three sources familiar with the matter said, halting support for Vietnamese coast guard drones.翻译:三名知情人士称，SpaceX 通过星链卫星向越南提供通信服务的计划已被搁置，并停止了对越南海岸警卫队无人机的支持。
item.author: Francesco Guarascio

item.title: 澳大利亚部长称中国在太平洋警务中“没有任何作用”
item.description: Australia's Pacific Minister Pat Conroy said there should be "no role" for China in policing the Pacific Islands, and Australia will train more local security forces to fill gaps, after Reuters reported Chinese police are working in Kiribati.翻译:在路透社报道中国警察在基里巴斯工作后，澳大利亚太平洋部长帕特·康罗伊表示，中国在太平洋岛屿的治安方面“不应该发挥任何作用”，澳大利亚将培训更多当地安全部队来填补空白。
item.author: Kirsty Needham

item.title: 中国2月份工厂活动可能连续第五个月收缩
item.description: China's manufacturing activity likely contracted for a fifth straight month in February, a Reuters poll showed on Thursday, possibly increasing the clamour for further stimulus measures as factory owners struggle for orders both at home and abroad.翻译:路透周四的一项民意调查显示，中国2月份制造业活动可能连续第五个月萎缩，由于工厂主在国内外争取订单而苦苦挣扎，这可能会加剧要求采取进一步刺激措施的呼声。
item.author: Joe Cash

item.title: WTA综述：中国组合晋级ATX公开赛四分之一决赛
item.description: No. 8 seed Yue Yuan of China and countrywoman Yafan Wang both completed sweeps on Wednesday in the second round of the ATX Open in Austin, Texas.翻译:周三，在德克萨斯州奥斯汀举行的 ATX 公开赛第二轮比赛中，中国八号种子袁悦和同胞王亚凡双双横扫对手。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 市场为美国通胀数据做好准备，日元因日本央行言论而走强
item.description: The dollar tracked toward monthly gains on Thursday as European inflation data trickled in and ahead of highly-anticipated U.S. data, while the sliding yen made back some ground after a policymaker hinted at the need to exit ultra-easy policies.翻译:周四，由于欧洲通胀数据在备受期待的美国数据之前陆续公布，美元走上月度涨幅，而在政策制定者暗示需要退出超宽松政策后，日元汇率下滑，有所回升。
item.author: Tom Westbrook, Alun John

item.title: 在微妙的中国戏中，利洁时转向直播销售安全套
item.description: Durex-owner Reckitt is hoping that Chinese consumers' penchant for livestream shopping will also extend to purchases of condoms, but the company will have to toe a "delicate line" as it looks to grow its slice of the $5-billion-plus condom market.翻译:杜蕾斯母公司利洁时希望中国消费者对直播购物的喜爱也能延伸到安全套的购买上，但该公司在寻求扩大其在价值超过 50 亿美元的安全套市场中的份额时，将不得不采取“微妙的路线”。 。
item.author: Richa Naidu, Casey Hall

item.title: 呼吁澳大利亚间谍头子公布“出卖”的前政治家的名字
item.description: Australia’s spy chief faced calls on Thursday to name the former politician he said had “sold out” to a foreign intelligence service as a former prime minister's son said he had been targeted by a group with links to a state parliamentarian.翻译:周四，澳大利亚间谍头子面临要求点名的前政治家的名字，他称这位前政治家“出卖”给了外国情报机构，因为前总理的儿子表示，他已成为与州议员有联系的组织的目标。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 随着中国兴趣减弱，亚洲对冲基金发行数量降至 14 年来的最低水平
item.description: Only 62 new hedge funds launched in Asia last year, the lowest since number since 2009 and just 15 were China-focused funds, data provider Preqin said.翻译:数据提供商 Preqin 表示，去年亚洲仅推出 62 只新对冲基金，为 2009 年以来数量最低，且专注于中国的基金仅 15 只。
item.author: Summer Zhen

item.title: 美国通胀测试前亚洲股市坚挺；日元上涨
item.description: Chinese equities and most other regional stock markets climbed on Thursday, while the dollar held its ground against European rivals ahead of crucial U.S. inflation data that could provide fresh clues on when the Federal Reserve will cut interest rates.翻译:中国股市和大多数其他地区股市周四上涨，而在关键的美国通胀数据公布之前，美元兑欧洲货币坚挺，该数据可能为美联储何时降息提供新线索。
item.author: Kevin Buckland

item.title: 据《南华早报》报道，澳大利亚邀请中国王毅下个月访华
item.description: Australia has invited Chinese Foreign Minister Wang Yi to visit in the later part of March for discussions spanning trade, security and more, the South China Morning Post reported on Thursday citing sources.翻译:《南华早报》周四援引消息人士的话称，澳大利亚已邀请中国外交部长王毅于 3 月下旬访问，就贸易、安全等领域进行讨论。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 财政部长称中国向巴基斯坦提供超过20亿美元贷款
item.description: China has rolled over a $2 billion loan to Pakistan, caretaker finance minister Shamshad Akhtar confirmed in a response to Reuters on Thursday.翻译:看守财政部长沙姆沙德·阿赫塔尔周四在回应路透社时证实，中国已向巴基斯坦提供了 20 亿美元贷款。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 朝鲜金正恩在不平等加剧的情况下寻求农村地区的“产业革命”
item.description: North Korean leader Kim Jong Un has called for an "industry revolution" in rural regions by building factories nationwide, state media KCNA said on Thursday, amid chronic food shortages and widening economic inequality.翻译:官方媒体朝中社周四表示，在长期粮食短缺和经济不平等加剧的情况下，朝鲜领导人金正恩呼吁在全国范围内建设工厂，在农村地区进行“工业革命”。
item.author: Hyonhee Shin

item.title: 西方大国在G20金融会议上就俄罗斯资产展开争论
item.description: Western powers butted heads over how to handle frozen Russian assets on Wednesday as G20 finance ministers kicked off a discussion of challenges for the global economy, trying to set aside deep geopolitical divisions.翻译:周三，二十国集团财长开始讨论全球经济面临的挑战，试图搁置深刻的地缘政治分歧，西方大国就如何处理被冻结的俄罗斯资产发生了争执。
item.author: Andrea Shalal, Christian Kraemer, Marcela Ayres

item.title: 中国承诺对贫困的塞拉利昂进行投资
item.description: Chinese President Xi Jinping promised to encourage Chinese firms to invest in minerals-rich but economically ailing Sierra Leone as part of Beijing's long-term drive to deepen economic and political ties with Africa.翻译:中国国家主席习近平承诺鼓励中国企业投资矿产丰富但经济陷入困境的塞拉利昂，作为北京深化与非洲经济和政治关系长期努力的一部分。
item.author: Reuters
